name: Death at a Convent
description: Your war rig bursts through the doors of an abbey. A baptism is taking place, you have only one choice -- three nuns or a new born babe, alone on the other track. Which is more pleasurable to imagine for your demented mind?

options.name: Three Nuns.
options.description: Three daughters of god who have dedicated their lives to selflessly helping pregnant mothers.

options.name: A Newborn Babe.
options.description: One baby, fresh to the world. They know nothing of evil, of the barbarisms of humanity, surely the poor sould doesn't deserve your wrath. There's only one of them; you can squeeze more suffering from the nuns.
